---
title: "Laboratory Science"
---

In the lab, I use [*Caenorhabditis elegans*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caenorhabditis_elegans), as a model to study the effects of chemical exposures on the nervous system, and the interaction of this relationship with the aging process. 

References:
